products.name: Athletic shoes
products.shortDesc: Sneakers, have a rubber sole and canvas upper and are designed to be worn while doing physical activity
products.description: additional sole support to protect the feet against ground impact, and tennis shoes are specifically designed to be flexible for tennis players. High-tops extend up to the ankles and provide stability to basketball players.

products.name: Ballet flats
products.shortDesc: An everyday version of the tradition slip-on ballet shoes which feature a rubber sole.
products.description: Mary Jane shoes are a version of a ballet flat with a strap across the top.

products.name: Boat shoes
products.shortDesc: These canvas or leather slip-on shoes have rubber soles that feature a cut pattern to prevent slippage on wet decks.
products.description: These canvas or leather slip-on shoes have rubber soles that feature a cut pattern to prevent slippage on wet decks.

products.name: Brogue shoes:
products.shortDesc: Are low-heeled shoe, loafer, or boot that features broguing, or hole perforations.
products.description: A wingtip is a type of brogues that has a W-shaped, pointed toe cap with wings that run along the side of the shoe, ending before the ball of the foot.
